banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: The power of transformative collaboration

nodes.whoTheyAre: As Chief Marketing and Communications Officer at Unilever, Keith Weed sees sustainability as a driver of consumer-led profitable growth. Along with the leading the creation of the Unilever Sustainable Living Plan, he has also pioneered new ways of integrating sustainability into the business. Weed has led a step change in marketing at Unilever, most notably with significant advances in digital marketing and technologies, and has championed the development of brands with purpose through Unilever’s crafting Brands for Life strategy.

videoData.description: Climate change is a global issue and action must come from every aspect of society to yield the needed change. How can corporations make a difference without losing profit? Keith Weed argues that sustainability and economic growth can go hand-in-hand, after implementing a few key approaches.
videoData.socialDescription: Climate change is a global issue and action must come from every aspect of society to yield the needed change. How can corporations make a difference without losing profit? Keith Weed argues that sustainability and economic growth can go hand-in-hand, after implementing a few key approaches.
